name: Deployment
description: The AWS::ApiGateway::Deployment resource deploys an Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) RestApi resource to a stage so that clients can call the API over the Internet. The stage acts as an environment

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description of the purpose of the API Gateway deployment.

properties.name: RestApiId
properties.description: The ID of the RestApi resource to deploy.

properties.name: StageDescription
properties.description: Configures the stage that API Gateway creates with this deployment.

properties.name: StageName
properties.description: A name for the stage that API Gateway creates with this deployment.
